Package Game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockSpawner
    The SpawnBlock class spawns a Block at a Location at the top of the Grid.
    Counter  
    FileReadWrite
    Reads and writes files.
    GameRunner
    A GameRunner is a Runnable that steps the current game instance forward.
    Grid
    A Grid represents the game field of Tetris.
    Location
    A Location represents a coordinate within a Grid in the format (x, y).
    Lock
    This class serves no purpose but to act as a lock for synchronization.
    Manager<T>
    A Manager manages type <T> objects.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Location.Direction
    Directions that can be used.
